gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 122, Hawks 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Hawks, 122-113. Tyler Herro recorded 30 points and seven rebounds for the Heat, with Duncan Robinson adding 27 points (21 in the 4th quarter) and three rebounds in the victory. Trae Young tallied 30 points and 13 assists for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 17-12 in the regular season, while the Hawks fall to 12-16.
